Since the group is becoming fairly large, this is probably a good
opportunity to see what the general opinion is about an important
question:  What do you think is the best application for NEAT?  That
is, if you had all the time in the world, where would you use NEAT?
Perhaps to control some kind of vehicle, in a video game (but what
kind of game?), board game, for predicition of some sort, in a big
artificial life world, maybe to evolve something other than neural
nets, or something else?  

ken
